messages.title: Election Communication
messages.content: The last few years have been frustrating. I get it. I've been just as frustrated as you.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Passing our Brexit deal which is agreed and ready to go from day one.
50,000 more nurses for the NHS to give you the healthcare you need.
More funding for every pupil in every school.
A growing economy that creates jobs and pays for our public services.

mentions.candidate: Let's get Brexit done with our deal. And let's unleash Britain's potential.
mentions.partyLeader: Rt Hon Boris Johnson, Prime Minister and Leader of the Conservative Party
mentions.tacticalSituation: Your postal vote can secure a majority government - if you vote Conservative. Last time we were just NINE seats short of a majority. This election will be just as close.

issues.brexitEurope: Let's get Brexit done so the country can finally move on.
issues.economy: A growing economy that creates jobs and pays for our public services.
issues.education: More funding for every pupil in every school. So your child gets a better education.
issues.governance: The country needs a majority government.
issues.health: 50,000 more nurses for the NHS to give you the healthcare you need.

endorsements.endorsement: Britain has spent too long going nowhere, spinning round in a hamster wheel of doom. That's why your role in this election is a huge one. Because you can get us out of it.

quotes.text: Brexit done. Better hospitals. Safer streets. Improved schools. Let's unlock Britain's future.
